title: does this game make anyone else feel kinda like.... terrible?
body:
I mean, this game at it's core, you adapt or you suck

the whole goal is to be the best but most of us are under plat, which is generally considered trash tier

games are frequently filled with people raging, sometimes you can't carry no matter how hard you try, sometimes you can't even just stay in the game simply because you're not thinking right

but it's not even a game anymore in many ways, it's like a sport.. but with no reward


you play a match, x lane is feeding, but you're fed as fuck, what happens? well you can't do anything regardless if that champ is good at shutting your champ down, 

now you lose a lane and x lane is fed this time, now you're the reason your team lost

people say the MMR system forces us 50/50 at a certain point, i'm not so sure it's true but i'm not so sure it isn't either

the idea of counterpicking, of a meta, of massive snowballs slapping us in the chin when we beg them to stop, it's irritating

hell winning doesn't even really feel good anymore, it juse feels like I got to the 1shot point and they didn't, now they can't do anything as i plow through three people alone regardless of what champ i'm on if i'm ahead, Hell i can misplay like fuck and still i win because stats.

fucking

stats.

the macro skill in this game has become redundant, you win your lane, roam, win another lane, roam or you try to weather the storm and have a comeback, sometimes you abandon your lane and win another guy's lane for him, but even still, only step one gets changed.

back in the day you could shove down your own lane hard, and try to fight people, and win on your own, now the dude at dragon pit will be at his inhib without recalling in under 25 seconds to contest you... oh and he 1shots you.


not too many people play the high skillcap champions anymore from what I can see, why learn riven when you can just play yi? 

I haven't seen kassadin in what.. two years? ekko finally came back but people are quickly gonna abandon him.

i've seen multiple games in the last week where the enemy team had a braum, a garen, a nautilus and a chogath, or some similar assortment, and they could simply slowly walk down lane because my team was too heavy on damage and too light on cc

yeah sure teamcomp is important, but should it be so important that it can tip the game unbearably? 

this bruiser bot lane thing isn't happening because of skill cap being raised, it's happening because we got rid of one toxic occurance and replaced it with another

why doesn't every class have a surefire way to deal with every other class through like an item? hell if a mage item that counters assassins is built, maybe an assassin item that counters mages could be designed to 100% level it right?

why is it that certain champions are always dogshit awful or apeshit insane? How hard is it to find a middle ground between mickey mouse and thanos?

and frankly, you say that people don't repeat offend, but i sincerely doubt it, because i still see toxic players regularly,  I generally only respond if i absolutely have to, like cheering on the dude that everyone else is bitching at because he went one fighter into another and died to a gank so now he's getting snowballed on and oneshot if he even tries to stand under his tower

it's like

the fuck

everyone needs fucking xanex or some shit

Play the game, smile, do some troll builds

stop doing this shit with mobafire/skt copycat builds when tons of people don't even know why the builds happen or what they optimize

stop bitching at eachother over this jenky ass imbalanced game and start being friends, who are here to play a fucking game

seriously

Nothing makes me play worse than a toxic team, nothing makes me care less about winning than a toxic team. 

But what does riot focus on? A dude makes a gay joke, boom permabanned immediately, a guy runs into games and calls everyone trash over and over? Maybe a chat restriction... maybe
